text:
> mapreduce at compile-time..?
Yea, I mean thats what the `myreduce` code above does. Eg the Base promotion mechanism is more or less
```myreduce(a, b, c, rest...) = myreduce(a, myreduce(b, c, rest...))
myreduce(::Type{Float32}, ::Type{Float64}) = Float64
myreduce(::Type{Float64}, ::Type{Float32}) = Float64
myreduce(x) = x```
and `myreduce(Float32, Float64, Float32)` is compiled away entirely
